mapper.insert: insert into assets (id, intranet_IP, "intranet_ port", port_service, extranet_IP, extranet_port, domain_name, asset_location, business_type, server_type, os_type, app_type, version, parent_project, charge_person, charge_department, email, tel, note) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{intranetIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intranetPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{portService,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extranetIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extranetPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domainName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{osType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentProject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargeDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update assets set intranet_IP = #{intranetIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "intranet_ port" = #{intranetPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port_service = #{portService,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extranet_IP = #{extranetIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extranet_port = #{extranetPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, domain_name = #{domainName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asset_location = #{assetLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, server_type = #{serverType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, os_type = #{osType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_type = #{appType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_project = #{parentProject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charge_person = #{chargePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charge_department = #{chargeDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, intranet_IP, "intranet_ port", port_service, extranet_IP, extranet_port, domain_name, asset_location, business_type, server_type, os_type, app_type, version, parent_project, charge_person, charge_department, email, tel, note from assets where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, intranet_IP, "intranet_ port", port_service, extranet_IP, extranet_port, domain_name, asset_location, business_type, server_type, os_type, app_type, version, parent_project, charge_person, charge_department, email, tel, note from assets
